name: Mighty Engine
tagline: Powering changemakers and the ideas they champion.
description: Mighty Engine is an award-winning, full-service marketing and communications firm. We are creative, culturally competent, and passionate about working with innovative nonprofits and socially responsible businesses. During this past decade, our clients have ranged from Fortune 100 corporations to small community-based non-profit organizations. Our services include business strategy, advertising, website design and development, graphic design, and marketing and communications planning.
